Our expert team ensures rigorous statistical analysis and biological interpretation.
whenToUse: Comparing gene expression between experimental conditions
Investigating environmental effects on gene expression
deliverables: Differential expression results with statistical metrics
Comprehensive analysis report with biological interpretation

steps.title: Quality Control
steps.description: Assess read quality, adapter content, and sequence duplication levels. Remove low-quality reads and trim adapters.

steps.title: Read Alignment
steps.description: Map reads to reference genome or transcriptome using splice-aware aligners.

steps.title: Quantification
steps.description: Count reads mapped to genes/transcripts and generate expression matrix.

steps.title: Differential Expression
steps.description: Identify genes with significant expression changes between conditions using statistical models.

steps.title: Functional Analysis
steps.description: Interpret biological meaning through pathway and gene ontology enrichment.

steps.title: Visualization & Reporting
steps.description: Generate publication-ready figures and comprehensive analysis reports.

bestPractices.title: Biological Replicates
bestPractices.description: Use at least 3 biological replicates per condition for robust statistical power.

bestPractices.title: Sequencing Depth
bestPractices.description: Aim for 20-30 million reads per sample for standard mRNA profiling.

bestPractices.title: Batch Effects
bestPractices.description: Randomize sample processing and include batch information in the experimental design.

bestPractices.title: Gene Filtering
bestPractices.description: Remove lowly expressed genes (< 10 reads across all samples) to improve statistical power.

bestPractices.title: Multiple Testing Correction
bestPractices.description: Use FDR (Benjamini-Hochberg) to control for false discoveries in differential expression.

useCases.title: Drug Response Profiling
useCases.description: Identify transcriptomic signatures of drug-treated cells to understand mechanisms of action.

useCases.title: Disease Biomarker Discovery
useCases.description: Compare diseased vs. healthy tissue to identify diagnostic or prognostic markers.

useCases.title: Crop Stress Response
useCases.description: Understand plant gene expression under various environmental stresses.
